name: AnimalAlbum
blurb: A Pokemon style RPG with real animals and without the fighting. Tells of nature, technology, a little sadness and a lot of kindness.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Any way the wind blows
-----------------------------------------------
Keep up with progress, get updates, see which way the wind blows before deciding. Support is always appreciated, thank you for that.
-----------------------------------------------
€1 ~ $1.38 ~ £0.82

Waiting for Linux
-----------------------------------------------
Show everyone that you want this game for Linux, keep up with its progress and get updates. As AnimalAlbum is currently Windows only, your vote for Linux will help in deciding which platforms to focus on. Thank you for your vote, I'll do my best to bring you concrete details before the campaign ends.
-----------------------------------------------
€1 ~ $1.38 ~ £0.82

Special Offer: What do you mean early bird? I was here before mommy bird and daddy bird even got together.
-----------------------------------------------
Game
-----------------------------------------------
A digital copy of the game which will be released around Spring 2015.
Lucky you! As an early backer, will you please help me spread the word about AnimalAlbum? Thank you!
-----------------------------------------------
€2 ~ $2.77 ~ £1.65

Special Offer: Egg. I'm comfy right here!
-----------------------------------------------
Game
-----------------------------------------------
A digital copy of the game which will be released around Spring 2015. I can imagine you're comfy, you got a great deal! Do you know some folks who might be curious about this project as well? Could you give them a heads up? Thanks!
-----------------------------------------------
€3 ~ $4.15 ~ £2.47

Special Offer: The proverbial early bird.
-----------------------------------------------
Game
-----------------------------------------------
A digital copy of the game which will be released around Spring 2015.
As you can see, a number of things do happen before the early bird comes around. Still, as an early backer, could you help me by spreading the word about this game? I appreciate it very much!

€5 ~ $6.91 ~ £4.12

Special Offer: Birds of paradise.
-----------------------------------------------
Game
-----------------------------------------------
A digital copy of the game which will be released around Spring 2015.
What's that bird? Chirp.. Tweet. Tw.. Twitter? Great idea! Please do :)
-----------------------------------------------
€6 ~ $8.30 ~ £4.94

Game
-----------------------------------------------
The main reward is of course a digital copy of the game, which will be released around Spring 2015. DRM-Free wherever possible.
-----------------------------------------------
Your name will also be added to the credits if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€7 ~ $9.67 ~ £5.77

Full Album
-----------------------------------------------
Game + For those of us who want all the animals in their album right away at the start of the game (this is like starting out pokemon with a filled pokedex). This spoils a bunch of surprises of course, but it's here if you want it.
-----------------------------------------------
Your name will also be added to the credits if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€11 ~ $15.21 ~ £9.07

Early Access
-----------------------------------------------
Game + a digital copy of an earlier version of the game. The earlier version will be rough and incomplete but you can see how the game is shaping up and be among the first to get to know the game and provide feedback. The estimated delivery date for the early version is not laid in stone, but it will be at least a couple of months before the final version is released.
-----------------------------------------------
Your name will also be added to the credits if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€18 ~ $24.89 ~ £14.83

Special Offer
-----------------------------------------------
Pick an Animal
-----------------------------------------------
Game + Early access + You can pick an animal and I will add it to the game, expanding the roster of animals. If you'd like, you can also provide the photo of the animal as long as you have permission for it and it isn't obscene. Since it wouldn't make much sense to add 100 cats, you get to pick another animal when your pick had already been added. Perhaps you have a cool pet or want to make sure a very rare animal makes it in?
-----------------------------------------------
With this tier your name will also be added to the credits along with the animal you picked if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€36 ~ $49.73 ~ £29.66

Pick an Animal
-----------------------------------------------
Game + Early access + You can pick an animal and I will add it to the game, expanding the roster of animals. If you'd like, you can also provide the photo of the animal as long as you have permission for it and it isn't obscene. Since it wouldn't make much sense to add 100 cats, you get to pick another animal when your pick has already been added. Perhaps you have a cool pet or want to make sure a very rare animal makes it in?
-----------------------------------------------
With this tier your name will also be added to the credits along with the animal you picked if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€40 ~ $55.31 ~ £32.96

Special Offer
-----------------------------------------------
Non-Player Character (NPC)
-----------------------------------------------
Game + Early access + I'll make a character sprite based on a picture you give me, you do have to have explicit permission from the person in the picture and it cannot be something obscene. The sprite will then be put into the game as one of the characters in the world.
-----------------------------------------------
With this tier your name will also be added to the credits along with your character if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€50 ~ $69.14 ~ £41.20

Non-Player Character (NPC)
-----------------------------------------------
Game + Early access + I'll make a character sprite based on a picture you give me, you do have to have explicit permission from the person in the picture and it cannot be something obscene. The sprite will then be put into the game as one of the characters in the world.
-----------------------------------------------
With this tier your name will also be added to the credits along with your character if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€55 ~ $76.05 ~ £45.32

Non-Player Character (NPC) incl. Text
-----------------------------------------------
Game + Early access + Non-Player Character + You can give your NPC something to say, maybe a shoutout to your friends or a loved one, or rant about your pet. Perhaps some wisdom for other players. This shouldn't be something obscene and there's a maximum of 50 words.
-----------------------------------------------
You also get your name in the credits along with your character if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€65 ~ $89.88 ~ £53.57

Original Concept Art
-----------------------------------------------
Game + Early access + An original piece of digital concept art will be made based on guidelines you provide. Exclusively for you if you want.
-----------------------------------------------
Your name will also be added to the credits if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€200 ~ $276.56 ~ £164.82

Playable Character Android
-----------------------------------------------
Game + Early access + I'll add a playable character to the game based on a picture you give me, so that everybody can pick between the robot or the new character. For story reasons the character will be an android, which means: looks like a human, but is actually a very sophisticated robot. You do have to have explicit permission from the person in the picture and it cannot be something obscene.
-----------------------------------------------
Your name will also be added to the credits along with the extra character if you'd like.
-----------------------------------------------
€500 ~ $691.40 ~ £412.06
